additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Sodium Palmate and Sodium Palm Kernelate or Sodium Tallowate and Sodium Cocoate, Water, Glycerin, Fragrance, Sodium Chloride, Titanium Dioxide, Etidronic Acid, Tetrasodium EDTA.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, immediately rinse with water. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use.

description: Velvet Pure Soap.Gentle on skin for sensitive skin.Velvet Pure Soap is specially formulated for sensitive skin types, leaving your family's skin soft and cared for. Gentle on skin.Dermatologically tested.Lightly Fragranced.Proudly Australian made and owned.
name: Pure Soap
